INSERT INTO KC28( AKB020,AKC220,CKC158,AAE011, AAE036,AKA063,AKC222,AKC223, AKC227,CKC197,CKC198,CKC159, CKC160,CKC161,CKC169,CKC170, CKC171,CKE081,CKE085,CKE086, CKE089,CKE090,AAC002,SKA003)
(select #{item.AKB020},#{item.AKC220},#{item.CKC158},#{item.AAE011}, to_date(#{item.AAE036},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),#{item.AKA063},#{item.AKC222},#{item.AKC223}, #{item.AKC227},#{item.CKC197},#{item.CKC198},#{item.CKC159}, #{item.CKC160},#{item.CKC161},#{item.CKC169},#{item.CKC170}, #{item.CKC171},#{item.CKE081},#{item.CKE085},#{item.CKE086}, #{item.CKE089},#{item.CKE090},#{item.AAC002},#{item.SKA003} from dual)

INSERT INTO KC27( AKB020, CKC179,AKC190, AKC220,CKC158,AAE011, AAE036,AKA063,AKC222,AKC223, AKC227,CKC197,CKC198,CKC159, CKC160,CKC161,CKC169,CKC170, CKC171,CKE081,CKE085,CKE086, CKE089,CKE090,SKA003,CKC188)
